question:
Aryian dismisses kayaks. Roman endorses kayaking. Ramanas overlooks playing ice hockey. Leithen adores the color pink. Marcus blasts scrubbing the tub. Amir exults in mixing music. Corben scorns penguins. Darroch glories in collecting postcards. Mateusz is obsessed with pizza. Dougal basks in the color lemon. Kingston finds pleasure in composing music. Nadeem revels in snakes. Aaron is neutral toward scorpions. Ammaar rejects roller coaster riding. Shawnpaul appreciates mystery. Lovell dismisses blogging. Mustapha is fond of alligators. Aden tolerates graffiti art. Gurveer is keen on the color silver. Bailie ridicules exploring caves. Darroch cherishes canoeing. Derick disapproves of visiting historical sites. Rahman detests climbing. Gil exults in racing cars. Zion welcomes making the bed. Jai-Rajaram is partial to playing the mandolin. Rayyan accepts guacamole. Rhudi bears reading mystery novels. Maximilian scorns cheese. Christian dotes sailboats. Ami neglects pruning the bushes. Zakk rails against the color silver. Liall reviles imagination. Brendyn endures geology. Thumbiko is partial to fishing. Mackie desires dumplings. Landon tolerates zebras. Shaw desires the color beige. Cohen thrives on the color purple. Cormack enjoys marathon running. Madox resents ecology. Ruo rejoices in the color tan. Sambrid scoffs at wisdom. Dion esteems parrots. 
Who tolerates graffiti art? Reply with a name enclosed within triple angle brackets, like <<<name>>>.
